carpet.rule.flippinTotem.name: Flippin Totem
carpet.rule.flippinTotem.desc: Use totem of undying to change block's facing.
carpet.rule.betterPiglinAI.name: Better Piglin AI
carpet.rule.betterPiglinAI.desc: When the first item slot of a Piglin holds a golden carrot, it will retain only the trading AI.
